name: Chicken Snake
description:
'WASD' = move 

hold 'SPACE' = lay an egg

You must collect your newborns by walking near them before you can lay another egg.

Don't run into your chicks! Don't hit the fence! Don't let your babies hit the fence! See how many chicks you can safely hatch. 

THX 4 PLAYING MY FIRST GAME <3 thebeff

"Sitting" chick image based off AntumDeluge's chick art found at https://opengameart.org/content/chick

"Chirp" sound from Aj_ available at: https://opengameart.org/content/birdcricketfrog-and-mosquito-sounds
